blog_summary: A begginer introduction to Data Science,it's various branches and what each branch consists of, a kickstarter article for basic knowledge

Numpy is one of the ost widely used libraries for computation in Data Science, consisting of 1-D, 2-D and upto n-D arrays. Indexind in numpy arrays turns up to be a little tweaked as compare to other data types. This article is a roadmap to the same.
Web Scraping being one of the most significant data extraction methods of the current time, this article is an introduction to the same with some examples
